data.title: New Zealand gay marriage bill passes

Norway Calls on the World to Ban Nuclear Weapons. Last week, an extraordinary, historic event occurred. The government of Norway invited all the nations of the world to a two-day conference to discuss the humanitarian effects of nuclear war and to begin the process to ban all nuclear weapons.
